title: MVP: Minimum Viable Product
text: Application where character details of the Breaking Bad series can be consulted, using the Breaking Bad API

screensFeaturesList.text: Uses redux & redux-thunk to manage the application state
Uses axios to manage http requests to the Breaking Bad API
Uses react-router to manage communication between routes
Uses React Bootstrap as component library, and Bootstrap styles

title: MVP + EXTRAS
text: Application where character details of the Breaking Bad series can be consulted, using the Breaking Bad API, plus some additions

screensFeaturesList.text: Uses redux & redux-thunk to manage the application state
Uses axios to manage http requests to the Breaking Bad API
Uses react-router to manage communication between routes
Uses a combination of sass + node modules to apply styles
